description: This dataset contains health-related data of patients, including personal details, diagnoses, and health conditions.

Name.description: Full name of the patient, including first and last name.

Age.description: Age of the patient in years, expressed with decimal precision.

Gender.description: Gender of the patient (e.g., Male, Female).

Birth Date.description: Birth date of the patient in ISO format.

Kennitala.description: Icelandic national identification number for the patient, unique to each individual.

Gout.description: Indicates whether the patient has been diagnosed with gout (True/False).

Obesity.description: Indicates whether the patient has been diagnosed with obesity (True/False).

Stress-Related Disorders.description: Indicates whether the patient has been diagnosed with stress-related disorders (True/False).

Cardiovascular Diseases.description: Indicates whether the patient has been diagnosed with cardiovascular diseases (True/False).

Eating Disorders.description: Indicates whether the patient has been diagnosed with eating disorders (True/False).

Addiction.description: Indicates whether the patient has been diagnosed with addiction (True/False).

Rare Genetic Disease.description: Indicates whether the patient has been diagnosed with a rare genetic disease (True/False).

Common Allergies.description: Indicates whether the patient has common allergies (True/False).

Hereditary Condition.description: Indicates whether the patient has a hereditary condition (True/False).

patient_id.description: Internal medical institution identifier for the patient, unique to each individual.

notes: All values are anonymized and randomly generated.
Ages are provided with high decimal precision, indicating detailed fractional years.
